H0.text: in which country were the two battles of el alamein fought. Libya

H1.text: in which country were the two battles of el alamein fought. Tunisia

H2.text: in which country were the two battles of el alamein fought. Algeria

H3.text: in which country were the two battles of el alamein fought. Egypt

A4.text: The battles occurred during the North African campaign in Egypt, in and around an area named after a railway stop called El Alamein.
